channel.title: Matt's Smf Service ( Need a forum for your server)?
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to Matt's Custom Smf Forum making service.[/center]
[center][i]My work[/i] [table] [tr] [td][font=impact]Hosted smf [/font] <snip /> [font=impact]Free smf with (createaforum)[/font] <snip /> [/td] [/tr] [/table] [/center] [u]I am going to create a service. I have much experience in this field of work. I will be providing the following services.[/u] - Help : Need help with a particular thing on smf? Such as installation, themes, mods, portals, pages, ect? I can help you out. - Need me to make a free forum or payed forum (using your money ofcourse) from scratch? I can do that, but i must have all information needed for boards, unless you allow me to do "free-reign" forum creation. - I will basically do anything involving smf created forums.
[i]Additions : 4 years of experience, can set up large forum in under 20-30 minutes, near perfect travel around both free and hosted smf cpanels. [/i] [b]Payment[/b] - If you desire a payed smf please install on your chosen cpanel of your webhoster. - [size=14pt]Paypal only![/size] - Price of my service will depend on what you want
[b]Prices[/b] - [u]From scratch[/u]{ $10+ }(depending on size and features you(the buyer) want added. - [u]Help[/u] {$2-10+} (depending on the amount of help needed) - [u]Other[/u] {will be assessed via msn chat}
[center][size=18pt]MSN : HELLSANGEL123@LIVE.COM[/size] In order to receive my service, you must add me as a friend on MSN.COM. And we will talk further from there. [/center]
Thank you.

item.title: Matt's Smf Service ( Need a forum for your server)?
item.dc:creator: @VengX.Org VengX.Org
item.description:
@VengX.Org wrote:

[center]Welcome to Matt’s Custom Smf Forum making service.[/center]

[center]My work
[table]
[tr]
[td][font=impact]Hosted smf [/font]

[font=impact]Free smf with (createaforum)[/font]

[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]
[/center]
I am going to create a service. I have much experience in this field of work. I will be providing the following services.

  • Help : Need help with a particular thing on smf? Such as installation, themes, mods, portals, pages, ect? I can help you out.
  • Need me to make a free forum or payed forum (using your money ofcourse) from scratch? I can do that, but i must have all information needed for boards, unless you allow me to do “free-reign” forum creation.
  • I will basically do anything involving smf created forums.

Additions : 4 years of experience, can set up large forum in under 20-30 minutes, near perfect travel around both free and hosted smf cpanels.

Payment

  • If you desire a payed smf please install on your chosen cpanel of your webhoster.
  • [size=14pt]Paypal only![/size]
  • Price of my service will depend on what you want

Prices

  • From scratch{ $10+ }(depending on size and features you(the buyer) want added.
  • Help {$2-10+} (depending on the amount of help needed)
  • Other {will be assessed via msn chat}

[center][size=18pt]MSN : HELLSANGEL123@LIVE.COM[/size]
In order to receive my service, you must add me as a friend on MSN.COM. And we will talk further from there. [/center]

Thank you.

Read full topic
